AMITA_CANNON.name: Amita Cannon
AMITA_CANNON.description: Fires a spinning ring of beads. When the ring collides with a wall, the beads expand outwards.
AMITA_CANNON.descriptionLong:
Bead Number: 8.8
Bead Damage: 7.5

Clip Size: 4
Ammo Capacity: 32
Reload Time: 1.6 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.4 Second

ASSAULT_BITS.name: Assault Bits
ASSAULT_BITS.description: Summon and control 3 bits that follow the player and fire lasers when attacking.
ASSAULT_BITS.descriptionLong:
Bit Laser Damage: 15
Bit Deploy Time: 1 Second
Bit Hp: 125

Clip Size: 40
Ammo Capacity: 200
Reload Time: 1.25 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.3 Second

BANANA.name: Banana
BANANA.description: Hold and release to fire a bouncy, exploding banana. A longer charge increases projectile velocity.
BANANA.descriptionLong:
Banana Impact Damage: 15
Banana Explosion Damage: 40

Clip Size: 3
Ammo Capacity: 27
Reload Time: 0.6 Second per Banana
Charge Duration: 0.3 Second

BATTERING_RAM.name: Battering Ram
BATTERING_RAM.description: Hold and release the shoot button to charge a directional melee rush.
BATTERING_RAM.descriptionLong:
Impact Damage at Min Charge: 15
Impact Damage at Max Charge: 60
Damage Resistance During Rush: 50%

Charge Duration: 0.3 Second

BEEGUN.name: Beehive
BEEGUN.description: Release a swarm of bees that home in and damage enemies.
BEEGUN.descriptionLong:
Bee Damage: 6

Clip Size: 20
Ammo Capacity: 96
Reload Time: 1.9 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.4 Second

BOILER.name: Boiler
BOILER.description: Fires a short-ranged spray of flame that ignites foes.
BOILER.descriptionLong:
Projectile Damage: 5.5
Burn Duration: 5 Seconds
Burn Damage: 3 per Second

Clip Size: 90
Ammo Capacity: 270
Reload Time: 1.5 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.04 Second

BOOMERANG.name: Boomerang
BOOMERANG.description: Fires a boomerang that returns to player.
BOOMERANG.descriptionLong:
Boomerang Damage: 35

Clip Size: 3
Ammo Capacity: 24
Reload Time: 0.75 Second per Boomerang
Attack Cooldown: 0.75 Second

BOUNCING_BLADE.name: Bouncing Blades
BOUNCING_BLADE.description: Fires a spinning blade in a straight line that bounces off of surfaces.
BOUNCING_BLADE.descriptionLong:
Blade Damage: 39
Blades bounce up to 5 Times

Clip Size: 5
Ammo Capacity: 30
Reload Time: 1.4 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.7 Second

CHARGE_BEAM.name: Charge Beam
CHARGE_BEAM.description: Hold and release to fire an energy beam in a straight line.  Fully charged beams are larger and pierce enemies.
CHARGE_BEAM.descriptionLong:
Beam Damage at Min Charge: 18
Beam Damage at Max Charge: 90

Clip Size: 4
Ammo Capacity: 16
Reload Time: 1.3 Seconds
Charge Duration: 0.5 Second

COLACANNON.name: Cola Cannon
COLACANNON.description: Hold the shoot button and drag mouse to build charge. Release to fire a continuous stream of soda.
COLACANNON.descriptionLong:
Soda Damage: 11
Spray Interval: 0.05 Second
Spray Duration at Min Charge: 0.5 Second
Spray Duration at Max Charge: 2 Seconds

Clip Size: 1
Ammo Capacity: 17

CR4PCANNON.name: Cr4p Cannon
CR4PCANNON.description: Fires a short-ranged shotgun-burst of scrap metal.
CR4PCANNON.descriptionLong:
Scrap Number: 9
Scrap Damage: 13

Clip Size: 2
Ammo Capacity: 22
Reload Time: 1.2 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.15 Second

DEEP_SEA_SMELTER.name: Deep Sea Smelter
DEEP_SEA_SMELTER.description: Fires a pair of molten slag pieces. Overheats when used excessively, igniting the user and temporarily disabling the weapon.
DEEP_SEA_SMELTER.descriptionLong:
Slag Damage: 15

Clip Size: 500
Ammo Capacity: 0
Attack Cooldown: 0.12 Second

DIAMOND_CUTTER.name: Diamond Cutter
DIAMOND_CUTTER.description: Hold the shoot button to extend a spinning blade that continually damages enemies.
DIAMOND_CUTTER.descriptionLong:
Blade Damage: 8.5
Blade Damage Interval: 0.017 Second

DUELING_CORKGUN.name: Dueling Corkgun
DUELING_CORKGUN.description: Fires a fast moving cork. This weapon deals additional damage when knocking enemies into walls or other enemies.
DUELING_CORKGUN.descriptionLong:
Cork Damage: 20

Clip Size: 1
Ammo Capacity: 36
Reload Time: 0.4 Second

FLOUNDERBUSS.name: Flounderbuss
FLOUNDERBUSS.description: Hold and release to fire a burst of fish.
FLOUNDERBUSS.descriptionLong:
Fish Damage: 15

Clip Size: 1
Ammo Capacity: 15
Reload Time: 0.8 Second
Charge Duration: 0.5 Second

FUGUN.name: Fugun

Balloon Damage: 35
Poison Damage: 42 per Second

Grenade Impact Damage: 15

Clip Size: 6

Attack Cooldown: 0.25 Second

HEXENHOWITZER.name: Hexenhowitzer
HEXENHOWITZER.description: Fires magic bolts that build charge when they inflict damage. When fully charged, the rate of fire and spread dramatically increase temporarily.
HEXENHOWITZER.descriptionLong:
Bolt Damage: 27

This weapon is ammoless
Attack Cooldown: 0.35 Second
(When charged: 0.07 Second for 32 shots)

ICEBERG.name: Iceberg
ICEBERG.description: Fires ice pieces that slide across flat surfaces.

Ice Damage: 45

Clip Size: 4
Ammo Capacity: 25
Reload Time: 1 Second
Attack Cooldown: 0.75 Second
Attack Delay: 0.15 Second

IRON_BALL_LAUNCHER.name: Iron Ball Launcher

Clip Size: 1
Ammo Capacity: 23

Ammo Capacity: 500
Reload Time: 1.3 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.1 Second

KILLER_BEAT.name: Killer Beat

Clip Size: 240
Ammo Capacity: 0

Attack Cooldown: 0.18 Second

LASER_GUIDED_ROCKET.name: Laser-Guided Rocket

Rocket Impact damage: 20

Ammo Capacity: 24

Laser Damage: 24

Ammo Capacity: 56

Attack Cooldown: 0.4 Second

LOVE_BOW.name: Love Bow

LOVE_BOW.descriptionLong:
Arrow Damage at Min Charge: 35
Arrow Damage at Max Charge: 69

Ammo Capacity: 50
Reload Time: 0.6 Second
Charge Duration: 0.25 Second

MACHINEGUN.descriptionLong:
Bullet Damage: 15

Ammo Capacity: 112
Reload Time: 1.5 Second
Attack Cooldown: 0.08 Second

MAELSTROM.name: Maelstrom
MAELSTROM.description: Fire a tornado that expands and deals continuous damage as it travels.

Tornado Damage: 12

Clip Size: 3
Ammo Capacity: 18

Attack Cooldown: 0.75 Second

MINIGUN.name: Minigun
MINIGUN.description: Heavy firepower but requires charging. User is slowed when firing this weapon.
MINIGUN.descriptionLong:
Bullet Damage: 20

Ammo Capacity: 600
Reload Time: 2 Second
Attack Cooldown: 0.05 Second

MORAYGUN.name: Moraygun
MORAYGUN.description: Shoots a stream of projectiles that move in an unusual pattern.
MORAYGUN.descriptionLong:
Projectile Number: 6
Projectile Damage: 13

Clip Size: 7
Ammo Capacity: 42
Reload Time: 1 Second
Attack Cooldown: 0.3 Second

MORNING_STAR.name: Morning Star
MORNING_STAR.description: Create a spiked flail at the end of a chain. Chain detaches when unequipped.

NEMATOCYDEARM.name: Nemato Sidearm
NEMATOCYDEARM.description: Fires spines that lodge into walls.
NEMATOCYDEARM.descriptionLong:
Spine Damage: 33

Ammo Capacity: 40

PARTY_POPPER.name: Party Popper

Popper Damage: 61

Clip Size: 1
Ammo Capacity: 22
Reload Time: 0.6 Second

PEARL_REVOLVER.name: Pearl Revolver
PEARL_REVOLVER.description: Fires pearls quickly in a straight line. Rapidly tap the shoot button to fire faster.

Clip Size: 6

Reload Time: 0.6 Second

PUFFBALLER.name: Puffballer

Attack Cooldown: 0.8 Second

RETICLE_STRIKE.name: Reticle Strike

Ammo Capacity: 25

RIFTSPLITTER.name: Riftsplitter

RIFTSPLITTER.descriptionLong:
Blade-Beam Damage: 30

Attack Cooldown: 0.4 Second

SCREECHER.name: Screecher
SCREECHER.descriptionLong:
Wave Damage: 12

Ammo Capacity: 240

Attack Cooldown: 0.15 Second

SLODGE_NOZZLE.name: Slodge Nozzle

Slodge Damage: 10

SNIPER_RIFLE.name: Sniper Rifle
SNIPER_RIFLE.description: Long-ranged weapon that can headshot. Headshots deal bonus damage at long range.
SNIPER_RIFLE.descriptionLong:
Bullet Damage: 55
Max Bonus Headshot Damage: +175%

Ammo Capacity: 21

SPEARGUN.name: Speargun
SPEARGUN.description: A simple weapon that fires arcing harpoons.
SPEARGUN.descriptionLong:
Harpoon Damage: 40

Clip Size: 8
Ammo Capacity: 88

SPEARGUN_NERFED.name: Speargun
SPEARGUN_NERFED.description: A simple weapon that fires arcing harpoons.
SPEARGUN_NERFED.descriptionLong:
Harpoon Damage: 25

Clip Size: 8
Ammo Capacity: 88
Reload Time: 1.5 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.2 Second

STICKY_BOMB_LAUNCHER.name: Stickybomb-Launcher
STICKY_BOMB_LAUNCHER.description: Fires bombs that stick to enemies and walls. Press the Reload button to detonate all active bombs.
STICKY_BOMB_LAUNCHER.descriptionLong:
Explosion Damage: 55
This weapon does not manually reload

Clip Size: 6
Ammo Capacity: 36
Reload Time: 1.25 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.35 Second

STUTTERGUN.name: Stuttergun
STUTTERGUN.descriptionLong:
Laser Damage: 18
Laser Number: 5

Clip Size: 5
Ammo Capacity: 35
Reload Time: 1 Second
Attack Cooldown: 0.6 Second

TESLA_COIL.name: Tesla Coil
TESLA_COIL.description: Fire pylons that connect to neighboring pylons, forming an electrifying wall.
TESLA_COIL.descriptionLong:
Pylon Lifespan: 4.5 Seconds
Shock Damage: 40
Shock Interval: 1 Second

Clip Size: 3
Ammo Capacity: 27
Reload Time: 1.8 Seconds
Attack Cooldown: 0.3 Second

TORPEDO_LAUNCHER.name: Torpedo Launcher
TORPEDO_LAUNCHER.description: Fires explosive torpedos in a straight line.
TORPEDO_LAUNCHER.descriptionLong:
Torpedo Impact Damage: 15
Torpedo Explosion Damage: 40

Clip Size: 4
Ammo Capacity: 24
Reload Time: 0.7 Second per Torpedo
Attack Cooldown: 0.25 Second

TRICK_GUN.name: Trick Gun

Projectile Damage: 60
Clip Size: 5
Ammo Capacity: 30
Reload Time: 0.75 Second

TYRRAZZAN_REAPER.name: Tyrrazzan Reaper

Clip Size: 10
AmmoCapacity: 70
Reload Time: 1.4 Second
Attack Cooldown: 0.15 - 0.6 Second

UNDERMINER.name: Underminer

Attack Delay: 0.1 Second

Vajra Damage: 44

Attack Cooldown: 0.4 Second

VINE_SOWER.name: Vine Sower
VINE_SOWER.description: Hold and release to fire a seed that grows vines.

Reload Time: 1.4 Second

WAVE_BEAM.name: Wave Beam

WAVE_BEAM.descriptionLong:
Laser Damage: 35

Ammo Capacity: 25

Attack Cooldown: 0.3 Second

XBOMBER.name: X-Bomber
XBOMBER.description: Fires a bomb that creates an x-shaped explosion.
